rules_text:
Flash
Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {2}. If you do, Ishi, WeSing Star phases out. When it next phases in, it can't be blocked until end of turn. [i](Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)[/i]
rules_text2:
[i](You may cast a legendary instant only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)[/i]
Up to two target creatures phase out. When they next phase in, they can't be blocked until end of turn.
